titleStmt.title: Mephibosheth and Ziba, or, The appeal of the Protestants of Ireland to the King concerning the settlement of that kingdom by the author of The mantle thrown off, or, The Irish-man dissected.

notesStmt.note: H.B. is the author of The mantle thrown off.
